      • checkPropertyNameAndLowerCase

        public static String checkPropertyNameAndLowerCase(String key)
        Makes sure that a property name is not empty an is lower-case. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the key is null or empty after trimming.
        Parameters:
        key - Original key
        Returns:
        Trimmed and lower-case key

      • getBeanProperties

        public static Map<String,Object> getBeanProperties(Object bean)
        Returns an index of all the accessible properties of a Java bean object.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Index of properties, never null

      • fillBeanProperties

        public static void fillBeanProperties(Object bean,
                                      Map<String,Object> props)
        Injects the values of the given properties into the given Java bean object. It makes sure that object class properties names match and their types are compatible.
        Parameters:
        bean - Input object
        props - Properties to inject

      • fillBeanProperties

        public static void fillBeanProperties(Object bean,
                                      Map<String,Object> props,
                                      Map<String,Class<?>> collectionsGenericTypes)
        Injects the values of the given properties into the given Java bean object. It makes sure that object class properties names match and their types are compatible.
        Parameters:
        bean - Input object
        props - Properties to inject
        collectionsGenericTypes - Generic types for each collection value in props
